article_title: How An IRA Can Help Charities....At Least Until December 31st

article_metadata.description: Do you have an IRA? Would yo like to make a charitable donation? Get the facts on a special IRS tax provision which is scheduled to expire at the end of 2013!
article_metadata.author: Mike Patton
